name: Ouroboros
description: The Ouroboros is a massive dragon embodying rebirth and transformation, featuring impressive physical attributes and variegated scales.
memorable: Its ability to rebirth itself upon death introduces high-stakes outcomes for both allies and foes.
goals: The Ouroboros seeks to embody transformation and create unpredictable scenarios in battle.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other magical creatures or dragons.
environment: Typically found in magical or ancient locations rich in lore.
strengths: Strong melee attack, high hit points, and versatile damage types.
weaknesses: Average intelligence and charisma scores may limit strategic interactions.
attacks: Two bite attacks that deliver consistent piercing damage and an Introspective Presence that incapacitates foes.
most_powerful_ability: Energetic Rebirth allows it to heal allies or harm enemies upon its death.
senses: Possesses blindsight to track creatures within 60 feet without relying on sight.
skills: Excels in Arcana, History, and Perception, showcasing exceptional knowledge in magical and historical matters.
additional_information: Can change damage immunity as a bonus action.
Kaleidoscopic Breath allows it to choose damage type dynamically.
Reactive Hide grants resistance to damage types.
Legendary actions provide versatile combat options.
Introspective Presence can incapacitate multiple creatures at once.
test_queries: dragon that can heal allies and harm enemies
dragon with versatile breath attack options
